tasks.task: Managing pasture for cattle without relying on grain.
subtasks: Analyzing the profitability of pasture management.
Selecting suitable cows for the pasture-based system.
Ensuring cows graze corn stalks and other grasses.

tasks.task: Minimizing tractor use in cattle management.
subtasks: Avoiding tractor use for 10 months while managing cattle.
Determining the necessity of tractor use in different seasons.
Considering economical methods to increase grass yield.
Evaluating the impact of cattle selection on grass management.
